CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 20, 1957, pg. 2, reads: "'Sign Man Lee' Rescues Baby in 3-Alarm Blaze - Fire Hero - As Lain L. Lee, sign contractor, was driving by an apartment building at 1436 Fifth Ave., he heard a mother screaming and saw fire and smoke billowing from the residence. He went to his garage and returned with his ladders in time to bring her baby out just as firemen arrived. Firemen then used his ladder to rescue the mother."
TitMainTitle: Sign contractor Lain L. Lee holding ladder on top of Fleetline car with sign painter advertisement
